info.title: VADER Sentiment Analysis
info.description: Sentiment analysis specifically trained for social media text
info.x-21-usage: Submit text to get positive/negative sentiment normalized to (-1,1); Options for submitting: follow on screen prompt, pass -s flag and string of text, pass -f flag and path to text file
info.x-21-quick-buy: Download client from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/elihaims/21apps/master/sentiment-analysis/client.py \n or use curl http://10.244.64.235:5002/analyze on 21BC
